sense.gloss: to hesitate, to have scruples, to be afraid of what others may think
to lord it over, to have great influence
with all due respect ..., I venture to say ..., Excuse me, but ...
thank you for your trouble, unfortunately ...

k_ele.e: 過ちては則ち改むるに憚ること勿れ

r_ele.r: あやまちてはすなわちあらたむるにはばかることなかれ

sense.gloss: do not delay in making amends for your wrongs

k_ele.e: 憎まれっ子世にはばかる

r_ele.r: にくまれっこよにはばかる

sdata.j: ↑過↑↓あやま↓ちては↑改↑↓あらた↓むるに↑憚↑↓はばか↓ることなかれ。
sdata.e: It's never too late to make amends.

sdata.j: どの↑家↑↓いえ↓も↑人↑↓ひと↓に↑憚↑↓はばか↓る↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓がある。
sdata.e: Every family has a skeleton in the closet.

sdata.j: どう↑思↑↓おも↓うって・・・それじゃあ↑忌憚↑↓きたん↓のない↑意見↑↓いけん↓を↑言↑↓い↓わせてもらうけどね。
sdata.e: What do I think, you say ... well then, I'll give you my candid opinion.

sdata.j: ↑憎↑↓にく↓まれっ↑子↑↓こ↓↑世↑↓よ↓に↑憚↑↓はばか↓る。
